description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember.
backEquip: Trophy Taken from a Fallen Emeny (A dagger, Broken Blade, or a Piece of a Banner
A set of Bone Dice or Deck of Cards
feature: Military Rank: You have a Military Rank from your career as a Soldier. Soldiers Loyal to your former military organisation still recognise your authority and influence and will defer to you if they are of a lower rank. You can use your rank to influence other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use. You can also usaully gain access to friendly military encampments and fortresses.
